name: Food Bomber
description: It is a flight shooting game with funny and horror elements. Beautiful and strange masters of nightmare are waiting for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7/WIN8/WIN10/XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 650 MB available space
